channel.title: jane on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in jane on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme

item.title: 使用hugo的jane主题时，categories 书写不规范
item.description: categories 不是列表 ➜ tomtsang-rootsongjc-hugo git:(master) ✗ hugo server Building sites … ERROR 2018/11/26 01:07:40 Error while rendering "page" in "posts/": template: _default/single.html:11:5: executing "_default/single.html" at <partial "head.html" ...>: error calling partial: template: partials/head.html:28:16: executing "partials/head.html" at <index ($.Site.Data.a...>: error calling index: value has type []string; should be string ERROR 2018/11/26 01:07:40 Error while rendering "page" in "post/": template: post/single.html:14:21: executing "content" at <.>: range can't iterate over cloud-native ERROR 2018/11/26 01:07:40 in .

item.title: jane主题中安装百度统计
item.description: 获取百度统计代码 登陆百度统计/管理/自有网站/获取代码, 得到形如 <script> var _hmt = _hmt || []; (function() { var hm = document.createElement("script"); hm.src = "https://hm.baidu.com/hm.js?9dd8aaaaaaaaaaa7a8bde80b13fe8eaf"; var s = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(hm, s); })(); </script> 我们要的就是 “https://hm.baidu.com/hm.js?9dd8aaaaaaaaaaa7a8bde80b13fe8eaf” 中的 9dd8aaaaaaaaaaa7a8bde80b13fe8eaf 放入config.toml 文件中 [params] baidu_push = false # baidu push # 百度 baidu_analytics = "9dd8aaaaaaaaaaa7a8bde80b13fe8eaf" # Baidu Analytics baidu_verification = "" # Baidu Verification 代码安装检查 登陆百度统计/管理/自有网站/代码检查, 得到形如： 页面代码安装状态：代码安装正确 表示已经加入了百度统计。
